name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, Appellee v. MUNICIPAL AUTHORITY OF the BOROUGH OF WEST VIEW, Appellant

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, Appellee v. MUNICIPAL AUTHORITY OF the BOROUGH OF WEST VIEW, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 27th day of December, 2007, the order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, Appellee v. MUNICIPAL AUTHORITY OF the BOROUGH OF WEST VIEW, Appellant.
